summary: This is a mod with a shouting follower. She is also a mage. you can find her in High Hrothgar. So you first have to finish the become a dragonborn missions to gain access.
descriptionHtml: This is a mod with a shouting follower. She is also a mage. you can find her in High Hrothgar. So you first have to finish the become a dragonborn missions to gain access. This mod is simple so i dont expect bugs. if ther are bugs report them for me.
author: ScrollsZ
